title: Hero Watch Video Button Functional When Video Available
description: Verify that the hero 'Watch video' button on the homepage launches a direct Vimeo video lightbox when a valid video is available.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Locate the hero 'Watch video' button.
Click the 'Watch video' button.
Check that a lightbox appears with the embedded Vimeo video player.
Verify the video plays without errors.

title: Hero Watch Video Button Absent When Video Unavailable
description: Ensure that the hero 'Watch video' button is removed or not rendered when the corresponding Vimeo video is unavailable.

steps.description: Simulate or configure the homepage with no hero video linked.
Load the homepage.
Confirm that the 'Watch video' button is not present on the page.

title: Lesson Video Cards Play Vimeo Videos on Click
description: Check that clicking lesson video cards on Home and Education pages opens and plays the correct direct Vimeo embedded educational video.

steps.description: Open the Home page.
Click on a lesson video card.
Verify that a Vimeo video player opens and plays the associated educational video.
Navigate to the Education page.
Click on a different lesson video card.
Verify that the corresponding Vimeo video plays correctly.

title: Vimeo Videos Load and Play Without Errors Across About, Education, and Home Pages
description: Validate that all embedded Vimeo videos on the About, Education, and Home pages load successfully and play without error messages or playback issues.

steps.description: Navigate to the About page.
Verify all embedded Vimeo videos load and play without errors.
Navigate to the Education page.
Verify all embedded Vimeo videos load and play without errors.
Navigate to the Home page.
Verify hero and lesson Vimeo videos load and play without errors.

title: No Content Blocked or 'Cannot Load Link' Messages on Site
description: Ensure the entire website displays no 'content blocked' warnings or 'Cannot load link' error messages in place of videos or external content.

steps.description: Visit all pages containing embedded videos and external content: Home, About, Education, News.
Check that no error messages such as 'content blocked' or 'Cannot load link' appear anywhere on the site.

title: Curated Social News Feed Displays Non-Duplicate, Valid Crypto News
description: Verify the social news feed on relevant pages shows curated static news articles from reputed outlets with valid links, distinct images/logos, unique dates, and no duplications.

steps.description: Open pages containing the Social News Feed (Home, News).
Verify each news card displays a valid headline, source logo, publication date, and opens a new tab linking to the original article.
Confirm no duplicate news articles or placeholder content appear.

title: Handpicked Educational News Section Displays Correct Links and Images
description: Check that the featured educational news section shows correctly handpicked articles with images and links to crypto recovery/security content.

steps.description: Navigate to pages with the educational news section (Home, News).
Verify articles display relevant images and source links opening in new tabs.
Check that the content aligns with crypto recovery and security topics.

title: Trending News Section Shows Unique News Cards Without Duplication
description: Verify that the Trending News section features distinct large news cards and list items with no duplicate articles, correct source attribution, and functioning links opening in new tabs.

steps.description: Open the News page.
Confirm trending news cards and list items are unique with valid metadata (title, source, date).
Click links to ensure they open in new tabs correctly.

title: All Broken or Missing Images and Icons Correctly Replaced
description: Ensure no broken, missing, or misplaced images or icons exist site-wide, including mission/recovery icons, team member photos, and within text content.

steps.description: Browse all pages (Home, About, Education, News, Blog) and visually inspect images and icons.
Verify no broken image placeholders or broken links appear.
Confirm no images are misplaced inside text paragraphs or have incorrect alt text.

title: Site-Wide Brand Name Consistency: 'CountWize' Used Correctly
description: Validate that all instances of the brand name use 'CountWize' exactly, replacing incorrect variations like 'Count Wise' or 'Count Wize'.

steps.description: Search entire site code and content for all occurrences of the brand name.
Confirm all displayed and code references strictly use 'CountWize' with no spacing or capitalization errors.

title: No Em-Dashes or Spaced Hyphens Used in Punctuation
description: Check that punctuation across the website replaces any em-dashes or spaced hyphens with appropriate periods or commas.

steps.description: Review textual content across all pages for punctuation usage.
Verify no em-dashes or spaced hyphens are present; all are replaced by periods or commas as per style guide.

title: Core Values Section Layout Correctly Stacks Heading Vertically
description: Ensure that the core values section heading is stacked vertically above the description on all screen sizes as per design requirements.

steps.description: Navigate to the page containing the core values section.
Confirm the heading text is stacked vertically above the descriptions in desktop and responsive views.

title: Footer Contact Information Grouping and Layout
description: Verify the footer contact information is logically grouped and visually presented according to design specifications across various device sizes.

steps.description: Scroll to the footer on all site pages.
Check that contact details are grouped logically and layout matches design including responsiveness.

title: Hero Section Call-To-Action Buttons Stack Vertically
description: Confirm that call-to-action buttons within the hero content stack vertically as designed especially on mobile and narrow viewport sizes.

steps.description: Visit the homepage.
Resize window to narrow/mobile widths.
Verify CTAs in the hero section stack vertically with appropriate spacing.

title: Blog Grid Layout Centers Odd-Numbered Last Article Correctly
description: Validate that the blog grid layout centers the last article if the total number of articles is odd, using correct CSS styling.

steps.description: Navigate to the blog page showing an odd number of articles.
Verify that the final article is horizontally centered within the grid.

title: All Platform Logos Link to Valid CountWize URLs or Are Removed
description: Check all platform logos on the site link to valid CountWize URLs; if URLs are invalid, corresponding logos are removed gracefully.

steps.description: Identify all platform logos throughout the website.
Click each logo to verify URL validity.
Confirm each logo either links to a valid CountWize URL or is not present if no valid link exists.

title: Book Covers Display Redesigned Thematic Imagery Matching Topics
description: Ensure that all book covers display distinct redesigned images that visually represent their respective topics such as legal, wallet recovery, forensics, scams, and case studies.

steps.description: Open pages where book covers appear.
Check that each book cover image corresponds clearly to its thematic content and is visually distinct.
